short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Calculate the estimated price when you want to buy a t-shirt
short.vi: Tính giá ước tính khi muốn mua áo thun

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The Best Gifts Finder application on Chrome Extension helps you quickly calculate prices based on the number of t-shirts you want to buy. You'll also discover popular fashion shirts like Diablo Pride, Ariel Red Christmas, Black Cat, and Baby Yoda, providing detailed information on colors, materials, and sizes.

How to install and use:

Setting:

Open Google Chrome browser.
Visit the Chrome Web Store.
Search for "Best Gifts Finder" in the search box.
Select the "Best Gifts Finder" widget and press the "Install" button.

Use:
Click the icon to open the utility.
To calculate the price of the shirt, enter the quantity you want to buy in the corresponding box and the app will display the estimated total price.
